resources.string: Pixels is an Android app that brings you the beautiful and interesting pictures from Reddit
The source code of the project is Open Source. The repository can be found in Github. \nhttps://github.com/worker8/Pixels
Please report any bugs, issues or feature request to the following link: \nhttps://github.com/worker8/Pixels/issues
